arts.ttl: Nightmare game for Girona goalie Gazzaniga as La Liga starts with Rayo Vallecano win
arts.sum: His two embarrassing first half mistakes — one leading to a goal and the other to a penalty and his ejection — helped Rayo Vallecano win in Girona 3-1 in Friday’s season-opener. The first blunder came in the 18th minute when a defender passed the ball back to Gazzaniga and the Argentine goalie couldn’t properly control the ball, which slipped passed him and allowed Rayo forward Jorge de Frutos to find the open net.

arts.ttl: Girona star to miss season opener vs Rayo Vallecano
arts.sum: A leading member of the attacking ranks at Girona is set to sit out the club’s opening fixture of the new campaign. The player in question? Cristhian Stuani. Girona, like…

arts.ttl: LaLiga predictions ahead of opening weekend of season
arts.sum: LiveScore brings weekly LaLiga predictions ahead of Friday's opening fixtures including Girona vs. Vallecano and Villarreal vs. Oviedo.

Girona will be hoping to head back in the right direction after a disappointing 2024/2025 campaign. It wasn't long ago that they were competing at the top of La Liga, but they dropped all the way down...
